name: detail
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: detail
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a single piece of information or fact about something

example.eg: She insisted on telling me every single detail of what they did to her in hospital.
example.egtrans: 她坚持要告诉我她在医院遭遇的一切。

example.eg: We don't know the full/precise details of the story yet.
example.egtrans: 我们还不知道故事的全部／具体情节。

example.eg: She refused to disclose/divulge any details about/of the plan.
example.egtrans: 她拒绝透露该计划的任何细节。

trans_examp.trans_en: the small features of something that you only notice when you look carefully

example.eg: I was just admiring the detail in the doll's house - even the tins of food have labels on them.
example.egtrans: 我只是感叹娃娃屋顶制作之精致——就连食品罐头上都还贴着标签呢。

example.eg: It's his eye for (= ability to notice) detail that distinguishes him as a painter.
example.egtrans: 他细致入微的观察能力使其成为一位与众不同的画家。

trans_examp.trans_en: a part of something that does not seem important
trans_examp.trans_cn: 细枝末节，无足轻重的小事

example.eg: Tony says, he's going to get the car, and finding the money to pay for it is just a minor detail.
example.egtrans: 托尼说，他要买那辆车，买车钱不过是小事一桩。

example.eg: A police officer took down the details of what happened.
example.egtrans: 一位警官详细记下了发生的一切。

example.eg: Can I have your details (= name and address, etc.), please?
example.egtrans: 可以告诉我你的个人详细情况吗？

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: including or considering all the information about something or every part of something

example.eg: We haven't discussed the matter in detail yet.
example.egtrans: 我们还没有详细讨论此事。

example.eg: The book described her suffering in graphic detail.
example.egtrans: 这本书详尽地描述了她所遭受的种种痛苦。

example.eg: He talked in great detail about the furniture he's chosen for the living room.
example.egtrans: 他详细介绍了他为起居室选定的家具。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to tell or include all the facts about something

example.eg: I won't go into detail over the phone, but I've been having a few health problems recently.
example.egtrans: 我在电话里就不细说了，但最近我的身体一直有些不舒服。

dsense.name: detail
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a group of people who have been given a particular task

name: detail
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: detail
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to describe something completely, giving all the facts

example.eg: Can you produce a report detailing what we've spent on the project so far?
example.egtrans: 你能不能写一个报告，详细列出到目前为止我们在这个项目上的花费？

dsense.name: detail
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to order someone, often a small group of soldiers or workers, to perform a particular task

example.eg: Four soldiers were detailed to check the road for troops.
example.egtrans: 派出了4名士兵为部队检查道路情况。
